-***REMOVED***Dispatching***REMOVED***requests
***REMOVED******REMOVED***-***REMOVED***Requests***REMOVED***sent***REMOVED***via***REMOVED***`adapters/`***REMOVED***(see***REMOVED***lib/adapters/README.md)
